ComicInfo.Title: Memoirs of A Serial Writer
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Borden Theater is about to close its doors forever. but sinister plans are in the works as a premiere event may turn out to be a bloodbath... Meanwhile a struggling writer fi nds the means of breaking into the business... one death at a time. Don't miss the brand new horror series from the company that does horror the right way!
